heisigStory: With a quiver of arrows set on one's back, the goal of the warrior depicted here is not to attack but merely to stop the attack of others: the oldest excuse in history!
koohiiStory2: A great warrior can stop any 0pponent with one arrow.
myStory: chiến binh. một người dừng lại với giáo mác
readingExamples: 武力 (ぶりょく), 武士 (ぶし), 文武 (ぶんぶ)
words: armed might, military power, the sword, force
